testsuite.name: TestCase.TestScript_001
testsuite.system-out: The Status code of the HttpResponse received against Http-Post request is same as expected : 201 The Response Body received against Http-Post request is : {"name":"morpheus","job":"leader","id":"840","createdAt":"2024-04-03T13:09:26.916Z"} Actual UserName in jsonPayload of the ResponseBody received against Http-Post request is same as the Expected UserName as the ActualUserName is :morpheus whereas the ExpectedNameOfTheUser is : morpheus id generated for the user in the dataBase after HTTP-Post request is : 840
